attributes.action: support the residents of Salford, Barbara Keeley - Labour Member of Parliament for Worsley and residents of surrounding areas in OPPOSING THE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT ON 50 ACRES OF GREENFIELD LAND AT BURGESS FARM, SALFORD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Burgess Farm still contributes to the UK's rapidly diminishing food chain. Government initiatives to sustain food production in the UK and reduce global 'food miles' need to be supported. The 170 acre farm will close with the loss of the 50 acres on which the farm buildings are located. These green spaces are a highly valued 'green lung’ for our communities. Once these green areas are gone we will never get them back. This development will not meet government objectives to get more people out of their cars and onto public transport as transport links in this area of Salford are not well supported. We urge the Prime Minister to oppose these plans.
